docs.title: About me
docs.text:
About me Néda El Hadj-Mimoune

I am a technical writer with more than 4 years of experience structuring and simplifying complex information to ensure optimal user experience.

I am currently looking for opportunities in tech companies that use the docs-as-code approach. I am based in Paris but open to relocate. Looking for hybrid or remote roles.

docs.title: Technical Writer
docs.text:
Scaleway (2021 - Now)

As a technical writer in the team, I:

  • Lead retrospectives and team weeklies

  • Deliver onboarding sessions and cross-company talks about Technical Writing

  • Translate the Scaleway console into French

  • Participate in wording sessions with other Technical Writers

As a documentation team representative in product squads, I:

  • Write and review technical documentation for all of Scaleway’s products and services, including how-tos, tutorials, FAQs, quickstarts, concepts, troubleshooting, and API reference

  • Deal with stakeholder requests and manage deadlines

  • Collaborate with Product Managers, Developers and Product

  • Write UX copy for the Scaleway console

  • Create interactive user guides (Guideflow) and short instructional videos to improve the discoverability and usability of the Scaleway console

  • Analyze support tickets to create troubleshooting content

  • Participate in brainstorming sessions and in making decisions about the product

docs.title: Notable contributions
docs.text:
• SEO Improvements - Updated doc site metadata and structure to improve SEO visibility

  • Attended Development classes - Took part in Python and Terraform trainings given by coworkers

  • Amplitude Dashboards - Created presentations, and shared insights with product teams

  • External Meetup - Co-organized and presented at the Documentation Team’s second external meetup on the subject of "Documentation as a product".

  • Training Other Teams - Organized workshops to teach coworkers from different teams how to use GitHub features and write documentation. Taught coworkers how to test and use APIs with Insomnia.

  • Onboarding Team Members - Created an internal onboarding website to centralize team processes for new team members.

  • Support Integration - Created new troubleshooting pages based on support feedback.

  • English Coffee - Facilitated weekly language practice sessions with coworkers.

docs.title: Writing Samples
docs.text: In my four years as a Technical Writer at Scaleway, I have had the opportunity to write documentation for different products, work on several types of documentation, and produce instructional video content. You can find examples of content I worked on below.

docs.title: Website
docs.text:
During my apprenticeship at Scaleway, I documented processes to accelerate learning and become autonomous. Later, I used those notes to mentor a new apprentice on API documentation and Insomnia, a tool I had learned to use during a workshop I had scheduled with a Product Manager.

This initiative eventually led me to develop an onboarding website for new documentation team members.

docs.title: User Interface Documentation
docs.text: Documentation of Scaleway products, i.e. how to use and manage them in the graphic interface: the Scaleway console. Different content types, such as concepts, how-tos, reference content, and API/CLI tutorials are available to help users understand and use the products.

docs.title: How-Tos
docs.text:
• How to create secrets
  • How to configure the Audit Trail permission set
  • How to send metrics from your Kubernetes cluster to your Cockpit
  • How to manage your email activity
  • How to allow remote access to your Web Hosting databases

docs.title: Quickstarts
docs.text:
• Secret Manager - Quickstart

  • Block Storage - Quickstart

docs.title: API/CLI Tutorials
docs.text:
• Creating and managing a Kubernetes Kapsule

  • Increasing the size of a partition

  • Retrieving logs programmatically using LogCLI

  • Creating and managing an Instance with CLI

docs.title: Reference pages
docs.text:
• Understanding your reputation score with Transactional Email

  • Setting up SMTP

  • Understanding DMARC configuration

  • Understanding security measures on a shared hosting

  • Understanding DNS records

  • Deploying External Secrets on Kubernetes Kapsule

  • IAM authentication events in Audit Trail

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
• No data showing up on Grafana dashboards

  • I cannot see any events in Audit Trail

  • I cannot transfer my domain

docs.title: Concepts
docs.text:
• Key Manager Concepts

  • Cockpit Concepts

  • Domains and DNS Concepts

docs.title: Tutorials
docs.text:
This is content intended to show users how to use Scaleway products with third-party tools and build applications. The tutorials below were tested and written by me, from specifications provided by developers.

  • Build and deploy an MkDocs static website with GitHub Actions CI/CD

  • Sending Cockpit's alert notifications to Slack using a webhook URL

  • Creating and accessing a Database Instance using Secret Manager and Terraform/OpenTofu

  • Deploying Meilisearch on a Scaleway Instance

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.text:
As a Technical Writer at Scaleway, I am not responsible for creating the APIs, but I am responsible for ensuring the description of path, request, response and body parameters, and other elements of the API reference. I am also responsible for writing the introductions you see at the beginning of the page, including the quickstart tutorial.

  • Audit Trail API
  • Secret Manager API
  • Key Manager API
  • Cockpit API
  • Domains and DNS API
  • Web Hosting API

docs.title: Videos
docs.text: As a Technical Writer at Scaleway, I am not responsible for creating videos, but when the company had fewer products, I volunteered to produce short clips for the marketing website to show users how quick and easy it is to get started with Scaleway products.

docs.title: Mini videos
docs.text:
• How to create a Container Registry namespace

  • How to add an IoT device to an IoT Hub

docs.title: Interactive demos
docs.text:
I have created interactive demos with Guideflow to show users how to navigate the Scaleway console.

  • Guideflow: Secret Manager console overview

docs.title: Internal training videos
docs.text:
I have also created internal videos to train other teams on several topics.

  • How to use the Suggest an edit feature.

docs.title: Blog Posts
docs.text:
At times the Documentation team collaborated with the Marketing team to write technical blog posts with the goal of providing valuable content while driving traffic.

  • The Hows and Whys of writing technical documentation

  • Which cloud model provides the most flexibility?
